executiveSummary.overallStatus: GOOD with critical typography and spacing inconsistencies
keyStrengths: Outstanding interactive hover states and animations
Strong visual brand identity with accent color system
Proper accessibility foundations with focus states
keyWeaknesses: Fragmented font system with 3 different font families
Mixed spacing approaches without unified system

issues.title: Multiple Font Family Declarations
issues.description: Three different font families used across the application
issues.impact: Visual inconsistency and performance impact from loading multiple fonts
issues.recommendation: Standardize on single font family (suggest Geist from layout.tsx)

issues.title: Missing Semantic Heading Hierarchy
issues.description: No standardized H1-H6 system, only custom title classes

issues.title: Inconsistent Font Weight Definitions
issues.description: Mixed weight definitions (700, 600, bold) across components

issues.title: Mixed Color Definition Formats
issues.description: Colors defined using hex, RGB, and Tailwind classes inconsistently
issues.impact: Maintenance difficulty and potential visual discrepancies

issues.title: Mixed Spacing Systems
issues.description: Combination of Tailwind spacing scale with custom pixel values
issues.impact: Inconsistent visual spacing and responsive behavior

issues.title: Some Inline Styles Present
issues.description: Occasional inline styles instead of CSS classes
issues.recommendation: Move all styles to CSS classes

strengths: Complex animation system with icon switching
Creative hover effects with colored underlines

exemplaryImplementations.feature: Icon switching from diagonal to horizontal arrow on hover

fontInconsistencies.issue: Fallback to Arial instead of Geist
Inline style with different font family

spacingViolations.issue: Custom pixel padding instead of design system scale

colorInconsistencies.issue: Inline hex color instead of design token

immediate.title: Font System Unification
immediate.description: Standardize on single font family across all components

immediate.title: Remove Inline Styles
immediate.description: Move all inline styles to CSS classes

shortTerm.title: Spacing Scale Implementation
shortTerm.description: Implement consistent 8px base unit spacing system

longTerm.title: CSS Bundle Optimization
longTerm.description: Optimize and reduce CSS bundle size

conclusion.summary: The CDA website demonstrates strong visual design execution with sophisticated interactive elements, but suffers from technical inconsistencies in the underlying design system implementation. The user-facing experience is excellent, particularly in hover states and responsive behavior.
conclusion.priorityFocus: Typography unification and spacing system standardization
conclusion.overallAssessment: Good visual results with manageable technical debt
conclusion.nextSteps: Focus on P0 immediate fixes to address typography inconsistencies, then implement unified design token system
